javavis.jip2d.base.bitmaps
Class JIPImgBitmap

java.lang.Object
  javavis.jip2d.base.JIPImage
      javavis.jip2d.base.bitmaps.JIPImgBitmap
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
JIPBmpBit, JIPBmpByte, JIPBmpColor, JIPBmpFloat, JIPBmpShort
public abstract class JIPImgBitmap
extends JIPImage
implements java.io.Serializable

Abstract class which defines a bitmap image. The abstract methods (double values) are declared to define a normalized way to access to a pixel value. Internally, double values are converted to a specified (boolean, byte, etc.) value.

See Also:
Serialized Form

public abstract void setPixel(int x,
                              int y,
                              double value)
                       throws JIPException
Set a value to a pixel. This method will convert the double value to a primitive type (e.g. byte) internally

Parameters:
x - X Coord of the pixel (0 <= x <= width-1)
y - Y Coord of the pixel (0 <= y <= height-1)
value - Value to assign.
